snippet.title: Morgan: Metal Detective - Official Trailer | Six One Indie Showcase
snippet.description: A cozy, first person metal detector adventure game, where you reunite residents of the beautiful Cornish island of Glasden with things they have lost. And with your late Grandpa's help, maybe restore magic along the way. Check out the trailer for Morgan: Metal Detective ahead of the game's launch on Nintendo Switch, Steam, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One X, PS5 (PlayStation 5) and PS4 (PlayStation 4).
